import Mathlib
open Set Fin Filter Function
open scoped NNReal Topology

/-- Let E = â„^n (a finite-dimensional normed real vector space). Let U be a convex subset of E. Let f : E â†’ â„ be C^2 on U (ContDiffOn â„ 2 f U). Show the Taylor remainder of order 2 is o(â€–hâ€–^2) uniformly on compact subsets of U: i.e. for every compact K âŠ† U and every Îµ>0 there exists Î´>0 such that for all aâˆˆK and h with a+hâˆˆU and â€–hâ€–<Î´ we have
| f(a+h) - f(a) - (fderiv â„ f a) h - 1/2 * ((fderiv (fun x => fderiv â„ f x) a) h) h | â‰¤ Îµ * â€–hâ€–^2.

This is stated as a theorem ending with := by sorry (no full proof). -/ 

theorem taylor_approx_two_on_convex_of_contDiffOn_tac_5021 {E : Type _} [NormedAddCommGroup E] [NormedSpace â„ E] [FiniteDimensional â„ E]
  (f : E â†’ â„) (U : Set E) (hU : Convex â„ U) (hf : ContDiffOn â„ 2 f U) :
  âˆ€ (K : Set E), IsCompact K â†’ K âŠ† U â†’ âˆ€ Îµ > 0, âˆƒ Î´ > 0, âˆ€ a âˆˆ K, âˆ€ h, a + h âˆˆ U â†’ â€–hâ€– < Î´ â†’
    |f (a + h) - f a - (fderiv â„ f a) h - 1 / 2 * ((fderiv â„ (fderiv â„ f) a) h) h| â‰¤ Îµ * â€–hâ€– ^ 2 :=
  by sorry
